attributes.action: Bring back the production of the BBC comedy series: Shooting Stars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish to bring back the BBC series 'Shooting Stars' staring Bob Mortimer and Vic Reeves.  The series has so far being running since 1995 with a total of 48 episodes, but there are no plans to record any more.  The series is hugely popular with the general public and has been loved by many.  By signing this petition you will be investing in the comical value of British television for years to come

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
